page.title: 18Unemployment
page.content: Workington was once a prosperous town with a coal mining industry, iron and steel works and a busy dock system. During the late 60s and mid 70s the town experienced the{closures}of its pits, a loss of its iron and steel making plant and a reduction of the necessary support services for these industries. As an{Enterprise Zone,}respective governments have encouraged small industries to develop in the 'lego' type buildings which have mushroomed on the towns{industrial estates.}Some of these industries have become established, others like Courtalds have vanished throwing many people once more onto the dole. Nearly 20% of the work force is {unemployed}and there is great fear that this figure will increase as the economic situation deteriorates.
